snp3.5:487: "Pucchāmahaṁ gotamaṁ vadaññuṁ,Kāsāyavāsiṁ agahaṁ carantaṁ;Yo yācayogo dānapati gahaṭṭho,Puññatthiko yajati puññapekkho;Dadaṁ paresaṁ idha annapānaṁ,Kathaṁ hutaṁ yajamānassa sujjhe".
snp3.5:488: "Yo yācayogo dānapati gahaṭṭho,Puññatthiko yajati puññapekkho;Dadaṁ paresaṁ idha annapānaṁ,Ārādhaye dakkhiṇeyyebhi tādi".
snp3.5:489: "Yo yācayogo dānapati gahaṭṭho,Puññatthiko yajati puññapekkho;Dadaṁ paresaṁ idha annapānaṁ,Akkhāhi me bhagavā dakkhiṇeyye".
snp3.5:490: "Ye ve asattā vicaranti loke,Akiñcanā kevalino yatattā;Kālena tesu habyaṁ pavecche,Yo brāhmaṇo puññapekkho yajetha.
snp3.5:491: Ye sabbasaṁyojanabandhanacchidā,Dantā vimuttā anīghā nirāsā;Kālena tesu habyaṁ pavecche,Yo brāhmaṇo puññapekkho yajetha.
snp3.5:492: Ye sabbasaṁyojanavippamuttā,Dantā vimuttā anīghā nirāsā;Kālena tesu habyaṁ pavecche,Yo brāhmaṇo puññapekkho yajetha.
snp3.5:493: Rāgañca dosañca pahāya mohaṁ,Khīṇāsavā vūsitabrahmacariyā;Kālena tesu habyaṁ pavecche,Yo brāhmaṇo puññapekkho yajetha.
snp3.5:494: Yesu na māyā vasati na māno,Khīṇāsavā vūsitabrahmacariyā;Kālena tesu habyaṁ pavecche,Yo brāhmaṇo puññapekkho yajetha.
snp3.5:495: Ye ve na taṇhāsu upātipannā,Vitareyya oghaṁ amamā caranti;Kālena tesu habyaṁ pavecche,Yo brāhmaṇo puññapekkho yajetha.
snp3.5:496: Yesaṁ taṇhā natthi kuhiñci loke,Bhavābhavāya idha vā huraṁ vā;Kālena tesu habyaṁ pavecche,Yo brāhmaṇo puññapekkho yajetha.
snp3.5:497: Ye kāme hitvā agahā caranti,Susaññatattā tasaraṁva ujjuṁ;Kālena tesu habyaṁ pavecche,Yo brāhmaṇo puññapekkho yajetha.
snp3.5:498: Ye vītarāgā susamāhitindriyā,Candova rāhuggahaṇā pamuttā;Kālena tesu habyaṁ pavecche,Yo brāhmaṇo puññapekkho yajetha.
snp3.5:499: Samitāvino vītarāgā akopā,Yesaṁ gatī natthidha vippahāya;Kālena tesu habyaṁ pavecche,Yo brāhmaṇo puññapekkho yajetha.
snp3.5:500: Jahitvā jātimaraṇaṁ asesaṁ,Kathaṅkathiṁ sabbamupātivattā;Kālena tesu habyaṁ pavecche,Yo brāhmaṇo puññapekkho yajetha.
snp3.5:501: Ye attadīpā vicaranti loke,Akiñcanā sabbadhi vippamuttā;Kālena tesu habyaṁ pavecche,Yo brāhmaṇo puññapekkho yajetha.
snp3.5:502: Ye hettha jānanti yathā tathā idaṁ,Ayamantimā natthi punabbhavoti;Kālena tesu habyaṁ pavecche,Yo brāhmaṇo puññapekkho yajetha.
snp3.5:503: Yo vedagū jhānarato satīmā,Sambodhipatto saraṇaṁ bahūnaṁ;Kālena tamhi habyaṁ pavecche,Yo brāhmaṇo puññapekkho yajetha".
snp3.5:504: "Addhā amoghā mama pucchanā ahu,Akkhāsi me bhagavā dakkhiṇeyye;Tvañhettha jānāsi yathā tathā idaṁ,Tathā hi te vidito esa dhammo.
snp3.5:505: Yo yācayogo dānapati gahaṭṭho,Puññatthiko yajati puññapekkho;Dadaṁ paresaṁ idha annapānaṁ,Akkhāhi me bhagavā yaññasampadaṁ".
snp3.5:506: "Yajassu yajamāno māghāti bhagavā,Sabbattha ca vippasādehi cittaṁ;Ārammaṇaṁ yajamānassa yañño,Ettha patiṭṭhāya jahāti dosaṁ.
snp3.5:507: So vītarāgo pavineyya dosaṁ,Mettaṁ cittaṁ bhāvayamappamāṇaṁ;Rattindivaṁ satatamappamatto,Sabbā disā pharati appamaññaṁ".
snp3.5:508: "Ko sujjhati muccati bajjhatī ca,Kenattanā gacchati brahmalokaṁ;Ajānato me muni brūhi puṭṭho,Bhagavā hi me sakkhi brahmajjadiṭṭho;Tuvañhi no brahmasamosi saccaṁ,Kathaṁ upapajjati brahmalokaṁ jutima".
snp3.5:509: "Yo yajati tividhaṁ yaññasampadaṁ,Ārādhaye dakkhiṇeyyebhi tādi;Evaṁ yajitvā sammā yācayogo,Upapajjati brahmalokanti brūmī"ti.
